text: Bassirou Compaoré (born 23 April 1998) is a Burkinabé international footballer who plays for Club Africain, as a forward. ==Career== He played for AS SONABEL, Ittihad Tanger, Chabab Atlas Khénifra and Club Africain. He made his international debut for Burkina Faso in 2017. ==References== Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Burkinabé footballers Category:Burkina Faso international footballers Category:AS SONABEL players Category:Ittihad Tanger players Category:Chabab Atlas Khénifra players Category:Botola players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Burkinabé expatriate footballers Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in Morocco Category:Expatriate footballers in Morocco Category:Club Africain players Category:Burkinabé expatriate sportspeople in Tunisia Category:Expatriate footballers in Tunisia
title: Bassirou Compaoré
